explanation: The analysis shows that three distinct services have logged warnings and errors. Service A reported 5 warnings and errors, Service B reported 6, and Service C had the highest count at 21. This indicates that Service C may require further investigation to address the issues indicated by its higher log count.
query: level in ("ERROR", "WARN") | summarize count() by resource.service.name

widgets.query: level in ("ERROR", "WARN") | summarize count() by resource.service.name
widgets.title: Warning and Error Counts by Service
